usa: The Smith Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-164" class="reference">[164]</sup>
The cartoon characters Bugs Bunny and Tom and Jerry debuted.<sup id="cite_ref-165" class="reference">[165]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-166" class="reference">[166]</sup>
Billboard publishes its first music popularity chart.[167]
The Selective Training and Service Act of 1940, reinstating the U.S. military draft, was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-168" class="reference">[168]</sup>
U.S. presidential election, 1940: President Franklin Delano Roosevelt was reelected to a third term, defeating corporate lawyer Wendell Willkie of Indiana.[169]
australia: A team of scientists, under Howard Florey, develops penicillin
Fascist Italy enters war, Royal Australian Navy engages Italian Navy in the early stages of the Battle of the Mediterranean.
albania: The Albanian Fascist Party was established.
The Albanian army was merged into the Italian army.
Greco-Italian War: The war began. The Italian army invaded Greece through Albania.
